channel.title: Comments on: What's happened to air travel?

item.title: By: Kerr
item.dc:creator: Kerr
item.description: <p>I've not noticed any difference in the punctuality of the actual flights, but the endless, useless, security theatre is really beginning to get on my nerves. No real added security, just lots pointless inconveniences for show so that the powers at be can be seen to have done something. Absolutely ridiculous. <img alt="Emoticon" src="<a rel="nofollow ugc">http://www.11tmr.com/11tmr.nsf/emoticons/DLYH-5N3GHR/$File/angry.gif"</a> /></p>

No real added security, just lots pointless inconveniences for show so that the powers at be can be seen to have done something. Absolutely ridiculous. http://www.11tmr.com/11tmr.nsf/emoticons/DLYH-5N3GHR/$File/angry.gif“ />
